title: This Raw Video Will Bring you to Tears (Ep 1290)
description:
In this episode I address the most raw, emotional, television moment that I’ve seen in a long time. It happened on the Sean Hannity show and we should all watch it. I address the silent majority building as evidenced by exploding gun sales. 

News Picks:

Are the polls on Trump to be believed?


Some GOP Bushie swamp rats are selling their souls and supporting hapless Joe Biden. 


Gun sales are exploding as Americans rush to defend themselves. 


Incredible job numbers for June as the economic comeback continues.

CNN’s Chris Cuomo gets wrecked in his own interview.
